lead_paragraph: There was a possession where LaMarcus Aldridge grabbed a defense rebound, outlet-passed to Manu Ginobili, who then turned and fired a 70-foot strike to Kawhi Leonard for a dunk.

headline.print_headline: Back to the Drawing Board for Thunder Against Spurs
headline.main: Back to the Drawing Board for Thunder Against Spurs
